attributes.action: Remove The Ban on phones on all schools in london
attributes.additional_details: My Children's phones were taken from them outside their school gates and i couldn't collect them due to the fact that i am always working and its troubling when my children can't message me where they are
attributes.background: Phones are taken from children for months by teachers at a glance

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. It's for your children's school, and other individual schools in London, to decide on its mobile phone policy. You could take the issue up with the school's senior leadership team.

You could start a new petition calling for an action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. For example, you could start a new petition calling for new guidance to schools against imposing bans on mobile phones or ensuring students have access to mobile phones in certain circumstances.
